get.description: This API lists all skills in a department

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: Search string, Used to filter skills by name starting with this string

schema.description: Search string, Used to filter skills by name starting with this string

parameters.name: skillTypeId
parameters.description: Skill Type Id, to Filter Skills by SkillType

schema.description: Skill Type Id, to Filter Skills by SkillType

parameters.name: skillIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the skills to list separated by commas. You can pass upto 50 IDs.

schema.description: The IDs of the skills to list separated by commas. You can pass upto 50 IDs.

x-custom-parameters-attributes: The IDs of the skills to list separated by commas. You can pass upto 50 IDs.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Active inactive filter for Skills. Values allowed are @ACTIVE@ and @INACTIVE@

schema.description: Active inactive filter for Skills. Values allowed are @ACTIVE@ and @INACTIVE@

post.description: This API lists reorders Skills in a Department
This API assigns tickets to agents according to their designated skills and routing preferences.

get.description: This API Gets the details of a skill

delete.description: This API deletes a skill from your help desk portal

get.summary: Get Criteria Fields for Skill in a Department
get.description: This API returns list of fields supported in criteria for Skills by module

post.summary: Map Skills in a Department with an Agent
post.description: This API modifies skills mapped for an agent in a department
This API removes existing skills and reapplies the required ones based on the ticket's current circumstances.

get.summary: List associated automation rules of the skill
get.description: This API lists a particular number of automation rules that include a skill,based on the limit specified
Returns skills mapped with an agent by department

parameters.name: departmentIds
parameters.description: list of Department Ids separated by commas,Maximum @10@ department ids allowed

schema.description: list of Department Ids separated by commas,Maximum @10@ department ids allowed

x-custom-parameters-attributes: list of Department Ids separated by commas,Maximum @10@ department ids allowed

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Skill Type Id, to Filter Skills by SkillType
Active inactive filter for Skills. Values allowed are @ACTIVE@ and @INACTIVE@

agent.description: Indicates whether the user is an agent or not

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of skill to list, @allowed minimum value 1, maximum value 100,default is 100@

schema.description: Number of skill to list, @allowed minimum value 1, maximum value 100,default is 100@

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the skills must be listed

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the skills must be listed
